name: Leaf Blower Simulator
description:
Made in 7 days for VR Jam 2020!

You play as one of the lucky few selected to test out an all new leaf blower model never before seen by the public. Enjoy a peaceful yard-like demonstration area in which you can interact with peaceful leaf-like demonstration leaves. 

Just remember not to go snooping around!

Made for the Valve Index, should support everything else... let me know.
